name: Rebel Infantry
Lore: 'The Alliance lost many fine soldiers at conflicts such as the Battle of Hoth. The Rebel High Command is aware of the cost of freedom from Imperial tyranny.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Rebel scouts (except pilots) are troopers. Rebel troopers have armor = 4 and are immune to Physical Choke. Whenever you deploy a Rebel trooper, may immediately deploy a Blaster Rifle on that character from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
